title: Login chat bug?
body: is anyone else having this thing happen when they login and it sends a message to everyone on your friends list? the first time it sent this message **"Come check out this streamer i found very entertaining and informative ------------------------- the second time was this **"Hey come check out this new league discord community i found thought you'd like it --------------------

replies.body:
Hmmmmmmm it sounds like you might have some kind of 'virus' or script running on your pc that's making that happen. A clean boot should stop it from loading, but I'd also highly suggest grabbing something like [**MalwareBytes **](https://www.malwarebytes.com/) to try and get that fixed. 

Also, I edited out that twitch and discord link for fear that's where the problems came from (didn't want anyone else getting hurt as well). But, if you could take that stream and send it to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) we can take a look into it and hopefully stop it.
